extracted_playbook.title: Update OSCAT Basic Library
extracted_playbook.description: Update the OSCAT Basic Library to Version 3.3.5 to address the security vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Adjust Library Version in CODESYS Project
extracted_playbook.description: Adjust the version of the OSCAT Basic library to be used in the Library Manager of the CODESYS project to Version 3.3.5.0.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Application on PLC
extracted_playbook.description: Update the CODESYS application on the PLC by download or online change and rebuild/download the boot application.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the OSCAT Basic library updated or the vulnerability mitigated in the PLC program?

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Download or Online Change
extracted_playbook.description: Perform a download or online change to update the application on the PLC.

extracted_playbook.title: Validate Values in PLC Program
extracted_playbook.description: Validate all values in the PLC program before they are passed to the affected function. Block negative values as function parameters of MONTH_TO_STRING.
